project.name: Bouncy Castle PKIX, CMS, EAC, TSP, PKCS, OCSP, CMP, and CRMF APIs
project.description: Changes to 1.80 by XiPKI: remove the java.* from Import-Package in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF for apacke karaf 4.2.*. The Bouncy Castle Java APIs for CMS, PKCS, EAC, TSP, CMP, CRMF, OCSP, and certificate generation. This jar contains APIs for JDK 1.8 and up. The APIs are designed primarily to be used in conjunction with the BC Java provider but may also be used with other providers providing cryptographic services.

developer.name: The Legion of the Bouncy Castle Inc.
